ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: It is fairly safe, you will be fine if you are L4 at least . . .   JUST RUN all the way and JUMP if you get attacked.   There is a watchmen at the crossroads
ygData.messageBody:
It is fairly safe, you will be fine if you are L4 at least . . . JUST RUN
all the way and JUMP if you get attacked. There is a watchmen at the
crossroads in steamfont . . . the only thing that attacks me on that
journy is in STEAMFONT . . Pumas, and Kolbolds can be aggressive. Puma
is kinda tough, I was 9th and got killed by one and I was only 1/2 a bubble
from 10th!! aaaaa! hehe I got 10th last night :-)

There was this little NPC Gnome that attacked me outta no where!!! and I
had to Shadowstep-Gate and when I got to felwithe I had 9 HIT POINTS!!! that
made me feel damn good!! :-) hehe
